dict.acceptation: 使纷纷落下；使变白；下雪；被雪覆盖，被雪阻挡；

sent.orig: Under the new law, Snow have been charge of the stability of the entire US economy.
sent.trans: 根据新法规，Snow应该负责整个美国的经济稳定。

sent.orig: Snow: You oughta go make her happy, too.
Snow: Go back home! Don't even come back again.
Snow: We gotta destroy it! Don't let it hit the ground in one piece!
sent.trans: Snow:“我们必须毁了它！别让它就这么撞毁大地！”。
